title: Help Required Obtaining Chinese Language fonts
content:
Hello Typophiles,

Can you please help me in my search for a couple of Simplified Chinese language fonts called STXiHei and STXiHei BOLD. Apparently they were shipped with some versions of Windows, but am having trouble pinning down a location where they can be purchased.

One of our customers requires the fonts for their document composition system. PCTT is the desired format.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Cheers  
Neil
author: schaffs
